The #rhway simply explained:
Apply common sense.
Radically.

I had a discussion of my "code isn't art" talk. It's about putting
- speed over reuse
- business value over sophistication
Safety is key btw

Also important: Code Stewardship.
"Uh that code is shit" is not acceptable. Everyone took part in letting that code getting written.
